mapper.insert: insert into CompanyInfo(companyID, companyName,companyScale, bossName, companyNumber, ci, categoryCode) values(#{companyID},#{companyName}, #{companyScale}, #{bossName}, #{companyNumber},#{ci},#{categoryCode})
mapper.select:
select CompanyID, CompanyName, CompanyScale, BossName, CompanyNumber, CI, CategoryCode, r from( select CompanyID, CompanyName, CompanyScale, BossName, CompanyNumber, CI, CategoryCode, rownum r from( select CompanyID, CompanyName, CompanyScale, BossName, CompanyNumber, CI, CategoryCode from CompanyInfo
order by r ASC))
